channel.title: Comments for page "Basic Firing Pin"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Basic Firing Pin"

item.title: Distilling Basic Firing Pin
item.content:encoded:
I just found that distilling a Basic Firing Pin will produce a Copper Shaft.

However, one will not recover the Blackened Dust that was also used in forming the Firing Pin in the first place. I assume similar results come from distilling other portions of the Wasteland items (one will recover one part, but will lose the other).

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Silver Shaft + Blackened dust makes it too but I can't edit the page.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
This information was, I believe, added from a spreadsheet that improperly added an extra row.

Could someone confirm whether the recipe is Copper Shaft + Blackened Dust or if Copper Shaft + Basic Harness really is the recipe? I won't be doing Outskirts missions for a week, which would be a little late.

If it is Copper Shaft + Blackened Dust, I would also ask that you fix the other pages listing this recipe.
